```{r}
library(tidyverse)



### read in yearly data

nipomo2016 <- read_csv("CCBER/nipomolupine2016.csv")
nipomo2016 <- nipomo20176!apply(is.na(nipomo2016) | nipomo2016 == "", 1, all),]
nipomo2016$year <- "2016"


nipomo2017 <- read_csv("CCBER/nipomolupine2017.csv")
nipomo2017 <- nipomo2017[!apply(is.na(nipomo2017) | nipomo2017 == "", 1, all),] # remove blank rows
nipomo2017$year <- "2017"


nipomo2018 <- read_csv("CCBER/nipomolupine2018csv")
nipomo2018 <- nipomo201[!apply(is.na(nipomo2018) | nipomo2018== "", 1, all),]
nipomo2018$year <- "2018"


nipomo2019 <- read_csv("CCBER/nipomolupine2019.csv")
nipomo2019 <- nipomo2019[!apply(is.na(nipomo2019) | nipomo2019 == "", 1, all),]
nipomo2019$year <- "2019"


yearlydata <-read_csv("nipomo5years.csv")
yearlydata$current.year <- as.factor(as.character(yearlydata$current.year))
```
